additional_info:
on central road, Fenced, Communications: electricity, gas, Water, Сanalization 
 Land plot is located next to main highway, close to sugar plant. Distance from the plot to Agara train station is 600 m. 
7.8 ha of land is of agricultural and 3.9 is of non-agricultural purpose.
Newly built 480 sq. m. building is situated on the territory.
3 600 sq. m. reinforced concrete foundation is present on the territory and can be used for installation of modular type building.
 There is also 20 000 sq. m. concrete slab that can be used for open type storage for containers.
Territory can be used for establishment of production and warehouse facilities, logistics center and other industrial purposes.
